attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: id21 's newsletter today highlights how 20 years of civil war in Sudan with massive displacement, has left Sudanese one of the world's most under educated populations. Attempts to instill Arabic as the main language, re - ignited civil war in 1983, so the petitioner is calling on the PM to endorse a pro - education policy as means of stabilising the region - the world cannot allow this human rights issues to continue ! Please do all you can, Gordon, to stop pro - govt militias abducting children into slavery - vulnerable groups in society have always paid the price of political movements. The history of the world is written in the blood of lawyers, politicians and activists - let no more innocents die !

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
